text: Jeremy Lloyd Lawlor (born 4 November 1995) is a Welsh cricketer who played for Glamorgan County Cricket Club and Cardiff MCC University. He is better known as "The King" a nickname given to him by his teammates after the legendary WWE commentator Jerry "The King" Lawler. He is a right-handed batsman who also bowls right-arm medium fast. He made his first-class debut for Cardiff MCC University against Glamorgan in April 2015. He made his List A debut on 25 April 2019, for Glamorgan in the 2019 Royal London One-Day Cup. He made his T20 debut on 18 July 2019, for Glamorgan against Somerset, in the 2019 t20 Blast. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh cricketers Category:Cardiff MCCU cricketers Category:Wales Minor Counties cricketers Category:Glamorgan cricketers Category:People educated at Monmouth School
title: Jeremy Lawlor
